name: Session (itch)
description:
You are a session band  - a group of musicians for hire. You're good... damn good. The only problem? The vocalist who hired you is missing...

Busk, groove and jam your way across the city to find her, winning over any and all audiences in your way. You'll need to improvise and adapt, changing up your riffs and play-styles to really get the crowd moving and avoid any musical mishaps.

Well, what are you waiting for? Get Jammin'!
